answers.answer: I'm the total opposite.. my bf says no to me sometimes because he's scared he might hurt me.. :(
Oh ur lucky I used to get horny alll the time nd as soon as I got pregnant I lost desire completely.

It changes throughout your pregnancy tho. But i know how you feel.. right before i was pregnant i was very sick to the point were i couldn't even function (i had undiagnosed diabetes) and my boyfriend went without sex for almost two months. I felt so bad especially since he was so understandingabout it..
Same boat 0 sec drive lol its part of pregnancy!
Omg I would love that for the last month I always try to have sex but my husband is always saying no

I don't really have the desire for it but I let the father of my child go for it as I know it'll get into it lolol. I'm 32 weeks and he doesn't get scared or bothered. I used to feel shy because of my body but he tells me he likes my belly.

My husband wont have sex with me because he is afraid of putting me in labor :/ been this way for almost 2 weeks. He jokes saying 'youre just using me to put you in labor' Im having my baby in 2 days and i want sex before we cant do it for 6 weeks! Lol
ME!!!!! Omg haha I'm 18 weeks and we've had sex ONCE. He is so good about it but I am just simply not interested lol. He keeps jokingly asking when the "horny" part of pregnancy starts.

I'm completely the opposite. My boyfriend has been sick for almost 2 months(no one knows whats wrong with him) and im dying for sex. Well Im dying to feel the connection we have during sex. Its driving me crazy.
Try back rubs....  ;-) nothing more relaxing and arousing than easing the sore muscles of pregnancy. I'm in the same boat as you with not being in the mood for it ever.

question: Hey mamas or mamas to be I'm 19 weeks pregnant and I don't have any sex desire.my husband has been very understandable but sometimes I just hate to say no because I know he wants it. Is anyone eals going through this?
title: no sex
